text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Trump doesn't want testing/tracing because the data would interfere with his lying. Trump has made the decision for US & we're headed toward herd immunity by natural immunity or by vaccine if one is made avail before we reach it naturally. Sadly, more people will die of COVID19.
